intent_atoms.description: Recognize senc, saio, and saiz boxes during fragment parsing so the pipeline records their offsets/sizes and surfaces presence to CLI/UI consumers without attempting decryption.
Child boxes cannot exceed parent ranges and overlapping payloads are flagged for CLI/UI surfaces.

Implement configuration layer, CLI flags, and UI settings for validation rule preset controls with bundled preset manifests, Application Support storage for custom sets, global-vs-document persistence layers, export metadata marking disabled rules as skipped, and CLI alias flags tracked via workplan items B7, C19, D7.
Child boxes must not exceed parent ranges and cannot overlap within the same parent.
